bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2005.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2005. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 4 of chapter 45 of the 2004 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE Animal Industry Board Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$641,806" and insert "$931,806" F.T.E., delete "41.9" and insert "42.9" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 13 of chapter 45 of the 2004 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS Regents System Office Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$16,468,540" and insert "$20,843,540" Adjust all totals accordingly. University of South Dakota Proper Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$22,812,648" and insert "$22,973,351" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$19,792,163" and insert "$22,621,134" F.T.E., delete "1,089.1" and insert "1,128.6" Adjust all totals accordingly. University of South Dakota School of Medicine Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$5,838,489" and insert "$6,766,953" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$2,641,413" and insert "3,570,828" F.T.E., delete "320.1" and insert "357.3" Adjust all totals accordingly. South Dakota State University Proper Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$3,528,866" and insert "$4,075,462" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$10,511,290" and insert "12,248,556" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$34,691,676" and insert "$35,663,154" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$34,612,147" and insert "36,645,040" F.T.E., delete "1,474.0" and insert "1,534.0" Adjust all totals accordingly. Cooperative Extension Service Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$4,704,032" and insert "$4,349,779" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$1,026,908" and insert "$1,381,161" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$314,788" and insert "$386,544" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$511,053" and insert "$439,297" Adjust all totals accordingly. Agricultural Experiment Station Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$4,433,559" and insert "$4,456,190" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$4,010,134" and insert "$3,987,503" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$2,992,748" and insert "$2,932,693" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$5,251,541" and insert "$5,870,027" Adjust all totals accordingly. Northern State University F.T.E., delete "336.2" and insert "344.9" Adjust all totals accordingly. Black Hills State University Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$8,809,487" and insert "$9,553,882" F.T.E., delete "399.2" and insert "402.8" Adjust all totals accordingly. Dakota State University Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$449,438" and insert "$521,771" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$1,665,072" and insert "$1,752,289" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. That section 15 of chapter 45 of the 2004 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS Mike Durfee State Prison Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$3,758,144" and insert "$3,138,440" Adjust all totals accordingly. State Penitentiary Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$4,725,714" and insert "$4,497,487" Adjust all totals accordingly. Women's Prison Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$980,722" and insert "$952,338" Adjust all totals accordingly. State Treatment and Rehabilitation Academy Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$1,701,971" and insert "$1,903,760" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 4. That section 16 of chapter 45 of the 2004 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES South Dakota Developmental Center--Redfield Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$1,766,899" and insert "$1,917,930" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$2,645,262" and insert "$2,881,489" Adjust all totals accordingly. Human Services Center Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$8,334,393" and insert "$8,857,888" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$1,291,976" and insert "$1,381,069" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 5. That section 22 of chapter 45 of the 2004 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: SECRETARY OF STATE Secretary of State Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$152,824" and insert "$352,824" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 6. General funds and expenditure authority appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2005 shall be reappropriated to fiscal year 2006. Section 7. This Act is effective June 21, 2005.
